## ModuleDeps type

Helper type to extract the deps type from a Module

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ModuleDeps<T> = T extends Module<string, unknown, infer TDeps> ? TDeps : never;
```
**References:** [Module](./lattice.module.md)
